data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

You will face forward or face left. Take 9 steps to the left, take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps to right, take 10 steps forward. Take 10 steps backwards. As you take 10 steps forward, you will be facing forward or face right. So, the answer is yes.

The instructions ask you to take 4 steps forward, which is in the right direction. You cannot take 6 steps forward when you are facing left. There are 60 steps and it takes 60 - 4 = 30 steps to go back to the starting point. So, the answer is yes.
